title: Things to Do
intro: Explore Spartanburg and the surrounding area with these local restaurants, attractions, and activities.

things.title: Cribbs Kitchen
things.description: Local eats and drinks in downtown Spartanburg's Grain District. Features small plates, table share foods, burgers, specialty cocktails, and wines.

things.title: The Peddler Steak House
things.description: Spartanburg's landmark steak house since 1970. Known for amazing aged steaks, fresh seafood, and more.

things.title: Main Street Pub
things.description: Local pub and restaurant serving American cuisine with a focus on fresh ingredients and craft beverages.

things.title: Wade's Restaurant
things.description: Family-owned Southern restaurant serving traditional meat & three plates with quality ingredients and made-from-scratch bread. Winner of the 2024 James Beard America's Classics Award.

things.title: Miyako Sushi Group
things.description: Authentic Japanese sushi and cuisine featuring fresh ingredients and traditional preparation methods.

things.title: Hatcher Garden
things.description: Beautiful 10-acre garden with walking trails, ponds, waterfalls, and diverse plant collections. Perfect for a peaceful stroll.

things.title: Fifth Third Park
things.description: State-of-the-art minor league baseball stadium and entertainment facility. Home to the HC Spartanburgers baseball team, featuring games, concerts, and special events. Perfect for sports fans and entertainment seekers.
